biotools.summary: The CEDAR platform provides an easy-to-use solution for creating and reusing FAIR metadata. CEDAR offers a metadata modeling, a flexible but rigorous semantics, and the ability to quickly produce structured metadata.

bioschemas.name: CEDAR Workbench
